attributes.action: recognise the bravery of John Smeaton through an official honour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see the government reward the bravery of John Smeaton, and other members of the public like him who risk their own well-being to ensure the safety of others.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
